trans-unit.source: Represents an object that arranges contextual tab groups in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 中排列內容相關標籤群組的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 放置其子項目所需要的大小。

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> 中，其子項目的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 的實際大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: 測量在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 傳遞期間準備排列子項目之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 的子項目。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 所需的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 大小。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object during the render pass of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 項目的呈現階段繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個控制項所屬之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項所屬之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定其父系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.Ribbon" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.Ribbon" /> 相依性屬性。
